complaint.description: MTN most pathetic company in the world. None of all the channels I've tried to get my WiFi Router sorted out resulted in anything - website, whatsapp, chatbot, phone calls, shop visits - just all dead-ends. I want to cancel my MTN WiFi Router & contract as it is not working. Please can somebody with authority call me!! #MTNshameonyou
complaint.suggestion: Please improve your customer service and ensure that customers can easily get assistance with their issues.
